info.freelibrary.xq
Class Files

java.lang.Object
  info.freelibrary.xq.Files

public class Files
extends java.lang.Object

An XQuery extension wrapper of some file utilities that throw exceptions. Throwing Java exceptions isn't acceptable for an XQuery extension.

Author:
Kevin S. Clarke

Method Detail

toXML

public static final org.w3c.dom.Element toXML(java.lang.String aDir,
                                              java.lang.String aPattern)
Outputs an XML representation of a directory structure using a regular expression to indicate what types of files should be included in the output.

Parameters:
aDir - A directory we want to use as the root in our XML file
aPattern - A regular expression that will match files in the directory
Returns:
An element representation of the directory structure

toXML

public static final org.w3c.dom.Element toXML(java.lang.String aDir,
                                              java.lang.String aPattern,
                                              boolean aBool)
Outputs an XML representation of a directory structure using a regular expression to indicate what types of files should be included in the output.

Parameters:
aDir - A directory we want to use as the root in our XML file
aBool - Whether we should descend through the directory structure
aPattern - A regular expression that will match files in the directory
Returns:
An element representation of the directory structure
